das.shapes

Class RegularPolygon

  • java.lang.Object
    • das.shapes.Shape
      • das.shapes.RegularPolygon

  • public class RegularPolygon
extends Shape
    This class models a RegularPolygon. It can perform common calculations as well as drawing a representation of the polygon to a Processing PApplet.
    Version:
    10/22/19
    Author:
    Pallavi Das

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RegularPolygon()
      Creates a default instance of a RegularPolygon object with all dimensions set to zero
      RegularPolygon(double x, double y, int numSides, double sideLength)
      Creates a new instance of a RegularPolygon with the center of the polygon at (x,y).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double calcArea()
      Calculates and returns the area of the polygon
      double calcPerimeter()
      Calculates and returns the perimeter of the polygon
      double calcr()
      Calculates and returns the value of the radius of the inscribed circle of the polygon.
      double calcR()
      Calculates and returns the radius of the circumscribed circle of the polygon.
      double calcVertexAngle()
      Calculates and returns the value of one of the interior vertex angles of the polygon.
      void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws a new instance of a RegularPolygon object with (x,y) as the center of the polygon // The number of sides determines what type of polygon it is and how many sides it has // The side length helps draw the side of each side of the polygon // The polygon is drawn using lines that have points at the calculated vertices, given the angle, side, and center
      void drawBoundingCircles(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
      Draws the inscribed and circumscribed circles of the polygon

      Calculates and returns the center point of the shape

    • Constructor Detail

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon()
        Creates a default instance of a RegularPolygon object with all dimensions set to zero

      • RegularPolygon

        public RegularPolygon(double x,
                      double y,
                      int numSides,
                      double sideLength)
        Creates a new instance of a RegularPolygon with the center of the polygon at (x,y). The polygon has equal side lengths with n number of sides.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of the center of the polygon
        y - y-coordinate of the center of the polygon
        numSides - number of sides of the polygon
        sideLength - length of each side of the polygon

    • Method Detail

      • calcVertexAngle

        public double calcVertexAngle()
        Calculates and returns the value of one of the interior vertex angles of the polygon. All vertex angles are the same.
        Returns:
        one of the interior vertex angles of the certain polygon

      • calcPerimeter

        public double calcPerimeter()
        Calculates and returns the perimeter of the polygon
        Specified by:
        calcPerimeter in class Shape
        Returns:
        the perimeter of the polygon

      • calcr

        public double calcr()
        Calculates and returns the value of the radius of the inscribed circle of the polygon. The inscribed circle is the circle that can be drawn inside of the regular polygon such that it is tangent to every side of the polygon.
        Returns:
        the radius of the inscribed circle of the polygon

      • calcR

        public double calcR()
        Calculates and returns the radius of the circumscribed circle of the polygon. The circumscribed circle is the circle that intersects each vertex of the polygon.
        Returns:
        the radius of the circumscribed circle of the polygon

      • calcArea

        public double calcArea()
        Calculates and returns the area of the polygon
        Specified by:
        calcArea in class Shape
        Returns:
        the area of the polygon

      • getNumSides

        public double getNumSides()
        Returns the number of sides the polygon has
        Returns:
        the number of sides of the polygon

      • getSideLength

        public double getSideLength()
        Returns the length of the side the polygon
        Returns:
        the value of the side length of the polygon

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws a new instance of a RegularPolygon object with (x,y) as the center of the polygon // The number of sides determines what type of polygon it is and how many sides it has // The side length helps draw the side of each side of the polygon // The polygon is drawn using lines that have points at the calculated vertices, given the angle, side, and center
        Specified by:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet to be used to draw the polygon
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its polygon drawn using lines connected from both of their vertices

      • drawBoundingCircles

        public void drawBoundingCircles(processing.core.PApplet drawer)
        Draws the inscribed and circumscribed circles of the polygon
        Parameters:
        drawer - the PApplet to be used to draw the circles
        Precondition:
        drawer must not be null, and appropriate settings should have been selected (color, fill, etc)
        Postcondition:
        the drawer will have its circle mode modified to PApplet.CENTER
